archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0533
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a business I want devices that are going end of life to show a notification so that I can alert my business and proactively select another device if required

properties.value: information about end of live to be stored where? Probably another integration. Details to be delivered during integration meetings Notification = email notification + message on Selfcare channel CCM could potentially send such notification. TBD.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
